accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: UNITE Local 10 and Local 23-25 Memorabilia #6000/050 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Canvas Bag New York Metropolitan Area Joint Board UNITE HERE!
Broadside Why do we have to pre-certify certain medical procedures and hospital stays? (2)
Award 2001 Community Appreciation Award presented to UNITE! In recognition of your outstanding contribution Chinese-American Planning Council, Inc.
Award Gouveneur Healthcare Services Special Recognition Award, presented to Local 23-25 UNITE
UNITE! Ribbons (2) ; UNITE! Proudly made in New York (cards) (9)
Certificate of Recognition to Local 23-25 UNITECommunity Mental Health Center of Maimonides Medical Center

scopecontent.p: Push pins One Hundred Years, Local 10, 2002 (4) ; Push pins Organize! Mobilize! UNITE!, Activist, '03-'04 (4) ; Pin VOTE Rockwell J. Chin, Run Rocky Run, City Council 2001 ; Pin Union Health Center is moving into the future, UNITE!, 1914-1998 ; Pin Jofre! ; Pin UNITE HERE! For Kerry Edwards ; Pin Centro do Salud de la Union en Camino, jacia el future, UNITE! 1914-1998 ; Pin UNITE! In art

Pin UNITE! Buy Union Buy American for the holidays ; Pins UNITE! (4) ; Pin UNITE! 2000, Gore Lieberman, VOTE! Use your voice! ; Pin UNITE!... ; Pin Organize! Mobilize! UNITE! ; Pin UNITE! Contract Action Team ; Medal Delegate UNITE! Convention 2003
UNITE! 1900-200, 100 Years (sticker) ; Magnet QCEDC, Queens County Overall Economic Development Corporation, Queens, a market for all 4 corners of the world ; Magnet Union Health Center
Banner/Flag 96"x39" Piece of white cotton (wrinkled and stained), two Chinese characters (red) sewn in the center (see photo online) appears to be incomplete
Banner/Flag 101"x31" White cotton, hand painted "Local 23-25 UNITE", CLUW Emblem in center of Chinese characters, yellow tassels along bottom
Banner/Flag 24"x37" Red satin on one side/white nylon on other side. Yellow Chinese characters on red side, yellow tassels, yellow piping around edge bottom is scalloped
Banner White cotton sheet with red and black handwritten/painted letters and Chinese characters "ASIAN Labor Festival Sunday 12N-4PM"
Banner "42x128" -- Red and White cotton, red lettering made of cotton, Chinese characters -- "Local 23-25 U.N.I.T.E. Wishes everyone a Happy and Prosperous New Year"
Banner 35"x146" -- White cotton with red and blue painted letters and Chinese characters "Garment Industry Day Care Center of Chinatown, Inc."
